explains: v. 压抑（痛苦的情感、回忆等）；抑制，克制（行为）；（尤指用武力）镇压，压制；实施镇压；使（基因）转录受阻遏

sentences.en: Yet children, also fearing their parents' punishment and the loss of parental love, come to repress most aggressive impulses.
sentences.cn: 然而，孩子们也害怕父母的惩罚和失去父母的爱，因此他们会抑制最具攻击性的冲动。

sentences.en: He burst in, making no effort to repress his fury.
sentences.cn: 他冲了进来，毫不掩饰自己的愤怒。

sentences.en: Never repress your emotions, otherwise, they would accumulate and boil over one day.
sentences.cn: 不要压抑自己的情绪，不然有一天这些情绪会积累，然后在某一天爆发出来。
